content.raw:
@{iche033} what is the plan for merging this forward? gazebo10 has protected members:

* `Camera::cameraProjectiveMatrix`
* `Camera::cameraUsingIntrinsics`

while gazebo9 has

* `CameraPrivate::cameraProjectionMatrix` (note change from Projective  -> Projection)
* `CameraPrivate::cameraUsingIntrinsics`

should we switch to the protected members? or should we keep them private and deprecate the protected ones?
content.html:
@Ian Chen what is the plan for merging this forward? gazebo10 has protected members:

  • Camera::cameraProjectiveMatrix
  • Camera::cameraUsingIntrinsics

while gazebo9 has

  • CameraPrivate::cameraProjectionMatrix (note change from Projective -> Projection)
  • CameraPrivate::cameraUsingIntrinsics

should we switch to the protected members? or should we keep them private and deprecate the protected ones?
